content_descriptors.notes: Demonschool contains frequent stylized depictions of gore during its combat sequences. Many of the enemies that are fought in battle carry horrific and grotesque appearances that could be terrifying.

legal_notice: © Necrosoft Games LLC. All rights reserved. Published by Ysbryd Games Worldwide Limited.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish), SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish), SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.4
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Monterey 12.4
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Demonschool Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM / DirectX 11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
